query:
SELECT 
  'TW' as market,
  dataType,
  lastSyncAt,
  status,
  recordCount,
  errorMessage
FROM twDataSyncStatus
ORDER BY lastSyncAt DESC
LIMIT 10
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'US' as market,
  dataType,
  lastSyncAt,
  status,
  recordCount,
  errorMessage
FROM usDataSyncStatus
ORDER BY lastSyncAt DESC
LIMIT 10
